comments.body:
I wasn't sure all the places we should mark this as deprecated, so, just sprinkled it across key documentation pages.

The source code looks all private to Spark, so, no real point in marking it as deprecated I think.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +66,70 @@  easy to set up a cluster.
* [Apache Mesos](running-on-mesos.html) -- a general cluster manager that can also run Hadoop MapReduce
  and service applications. (Deprecated)
* [Hadoop YARN](running-on-yarn.html) -- the resource manager in Hadoop 2.
* [Kubernetes](running-on-kubernetes.html) -- an open-source system for automating deployment, scaling,
